headline: TKO Announces Completion of $800 Million Accelerated Share Repurchase and Commencement of $174 Million 10b5-1 Trading Plan
summary: NEW YORK, November 18, 2025--TKO Group Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: TKO) ("TKO" or the "Company"), a premium sports and entertainment company, today announced the completion of its accelerated share repurchase agreement (the "ASR Agreement") to repurchase $800 million of its outstanding Class A common stock.
